title: Celebrating neighborhood milestones as full member
description: Celebrating neighborhood milestones as full member
content:
Scenario: Celebrating neighborhood milestones as full member
    Given the neighborhood is celebrating its 50th anniversary
    And there's a celebration planning committee
    When Jordan expresses interest in helping plan
    Then the neighborhood_elohim facilitates Jordan's participation
    And Jordan contributes ideas at their capability level
    And committee members include Jordan as a peer planner
    And Jordan's suggestions are considered alongside others'
    And Jordan helps create celebration that includes everyone
    And Jordan experiences being an active neighborhood citizen
    And Jordan's community membership is fully honored
